title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the Most Recently Used (MRU) list in the File menu are not saved and do not persist between sessions.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be saved and reappear in the list when the workbench is restarted.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench. 
2. Open 2 or 3 files. 
3. Shutdown the workbench. 
4. Restart the workbench.
